description.value:
[Addictive] Character removes any Addictions they are currently suffering from, doesn't eliminate any of the other side effects. Character suffers -10 to all Agility and Perception Tests for 1d5 Hours, Addictions to this drug are twice as hard to remove, and cannot be cured by this drug.

Requirements

Very Addictive.

Effect: Average

Notes: -
